name: Shadow Scared
description:
You need to survive 'till 6 am by getting rid of anomalies in house.

This is horror game about Carl Jonson. He's home alone. But then he realises before sleep that something wrong in the house.  You need to find anomalies and getting rid of them. You need to survive 'till 6 am. Enjoy.

But you need to be fast. If there will be a lot of anomalies at a time, something will happen...
